sentences.en: ...the top award for excellence in journalism and the arts.
sentences.cn: …新闻与艺术界的最高杰出奖。
因学术上的杰出成就而获得的声誉

sentences.en: As far as quality is concerned, we must not make do with what we have, but must constantly strive for excellence.
sentences.cn: 在质量[品质]方面, 不能将就, 要精益求精.

sentences.en: Bresson is par excellence the Catholic film-maker.
sentences.cn: 布雷森是个非常出色的天主教电影制作人。

sentences.en: He has been a meticulous manager, a manager par excellence.
sentences.cn: 他是个十分细心的经理，出类拔萃的经理。

sentences.en: He has won a prize for excellence in furniture design.
sentences.cn: 他赢得了家具设计优胜奖.

sentences.en: He is famous for the excellence of his fine arts.
sentences.cn: 他以优秀的美术作品而闻名.

sentences.en: He made a citadel of personal excellence.
His art has reached a high degree of excellence.
sentences.cn: 他的艺术已达到炉火纯青的地步.

sentences.en: His name became a byword for excellence in Saskatchewar hunting circles.
sentences.cn: 他的名字在萨斯喀彻温河狩猎区成了优秀(猎犬)的别名.

sentences.en: His record of academic excellence continued through college.
sentences.cn: 他大学时代成绩一直全优.

sentences.en: It became difficult to promote excellence without being accused of elitism.
sentences.cn: 提倡追求杰出难免被指责为宣扬精英论。

sentences.en: My performance is far below excellence.
sentences.cn: 我的表演离优秀还差得远呢.

sentences.en: Papa would pretend to gobble, to emphasize this " excellence. "
sentences.cn: 爸爸假装狼吞虎咽, 以强调它的 “ 可口. ”

sentences.en: The girl laughed delightedly, evidently taking this as a tribute to the excellence of her disguise.
sentences.cn: 姑娘喜得哈哈大笑, 显然觉得他在恭维她装得逼真.

sentences.en: There is a pernicious culture of excellence: everything has to be not merely good but the best.
sentences.cn: 对于优秀存在着一种认识的误区：一切都务求最好。

trans.tran_en: If someone or something has the quality of excellence, they are extremely good in some way
